thesaurus.dc:description: The detec_type Vocabulary is a recommended set of values to use for the detec_type (MIXS:0000084) term in the DNA Derived Data extension.
thesaurus.dc:title: Genomic Standards Consortium detec_type Vocabulary (MIXS:0000084)

term.dc:title: independent sequence (UViG)
